description: Music invites the Spirit and teaches gospel principles. A collection of music used by and for families, children, and Primary organizations, including the Children’s Songbook, Hymns, and music from the Friend magazine.
content:

ASL Children’s Songbook
Hymns

Hymns Made Easy
I Can Play It
Music for Children
Music from the Friend
“I Will Walk with Jesus”
A new Primary song, “I Will Walk with Jesus,” was shared with the world during a Face to Face event with Elder Gerrit W. Gong on November 17, 2019.
Listen to and download audio and sheet music
